page.title: 06THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: The 142 year old school named Sale and Daveys C.E. primary school has only 54 children attending it.They range from 4-11.They do not have to wear a uniform but the colours are green and gold. The school has 3 classrooms, 1 kitchen,1 hall and 1 workroom.There are 3 teachers and 1 part time teacher.They start school at 9.00a.m and finish at 3.30p.m.They have a break time which lasts 15 minutes . The dinner hour starts at 12.00p.m and finishes at 1.15 for juniors and 1.30 for infants. The children stay in the same room for lessons and their equiptment is provided.The school has 1 computer and out of school activities are games,netball,football,recorders,disco s and a youth club.The punishment is a good telling off.
